meanings.definition: Relating to the measurement of the depth of bodies of water.
meanings.sent1: The bathymetric map showed the varying depths of the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used bathymetric tools to explore the underwater terrain.
meanings.sent3: The bathymetric equipment decided to take a deep dive into the sea for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a bathymetric chart, revealing hidden thoughts beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The bathymetric data painted a vivid picture of the underwater landscape.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of measuring the depth of bodies of water.
meanings.sent1: She specialized in bathymetric studies to understand ocean depths.
meanings.sent2: The bathymetric of the lake was crucial for navigation and research.
meanings.sent3: During the bathymetric class, they measured the depth of a tiny puddle.
meanings.sent4: His fascination with bathymetric led him to explore the mysteries of the deep.
meanings.sent5: The bathymetric revealed hidden secrets of the underwater world.
